Football
organizations: Imhotep Institute Charter High School (Philadelphia, Pa)
Martin Luther King High School (Philadelphia, Pa)
lead_paragraph: After archrival high schools joined forces because of a budget shortfall, many doubted the merger would work. But the football team has triumphed over skepticism and inspired hope for academic success.
snippet: After archrival high schools joined forces because of a budget shortfall, many doubted the merger would work. But the football team has triumphed over skepticism and inspired hope for academic success.
